sentences.en: Drop the slices into the oil and fry until golden brown.
sentences.cn: 将切片倒进油里，煎至金棕色。

sentences.en: Fry for about 4 minutes, until the onion has softened.
sentences.cn: 煎4分钟左右，直到洋葱变软。

sentences.en: Fry remaining peppers, adding a little more dressing if necessary.
sentences.cn: 用油炸一下剩下的辣椒，如果需要再加点调味汁。

sentences.en: Fry the chops until brown on both sides.
sentences.cn: 将排骨煎至两面呈棕黄色。

sentences.en: Fry the onions until they soften.
Fry the potatoes, covered, for about 20 minutes.
sentences.cn: 盖上盖，将马铃薯煎20分钟左右。

sentences.en: Heat the oil and deep-fry the fish fillets.
sentences.cn: 将油加热，然后放入鱼片煎炸。
我闻到了煎洋葱的味道。

sentences.en: It's the small fry who are usually the last to get paid.
sentences.cn: 小人物往往是最后才拿到酬金。
将炒菜和“方便”面一起端上桌。

sentences.en: So when you fry, bake, grill, or roast potatoes you could be generating potentially harmful carcinogens.
sentences.cn: 因此当你油炸、烘烤、烧烤或者炒土豆时，有可能会产生有害的致癌物。

sentences.en: The Australians fry their bananas and sweeten them with honey.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚人把香蕉炸了，然后再淋上蜂蜜吃。

sentences.en: These local companies are only small fry compared with the huge multinationals.
sentences.cn: 同那些跨国公司比,这些当地的公司不过是小鱼小虾.

sentences.en: We'll fry if we stay too long in this hot sun.
sentences.cn: 我们如果在这样酷热的阳光下待久了,皮肤会晒黑的.

words.tran_cn: 油炸的，油煎的；喝醉了的
可供油炸的食品；油炸锅；做油煎食品的人

phrases.tran_cn: 无足轻重的人；不重要的

trans.tran_cn: 鱼苗，鱼秧，弗赖伊（姓氏），油炸食物，（口语）烦恼，愤激
trans.tran_en: the young of various species of fish
to cook something in hot fat or oil, or to be cooked in hot fat or oil

trans.tran_cn: 用油煎，用油炸烤炒，油炸
油炸，油煎，（美俚）使被处电刑，瓦解
trans.tran_en: to cook something in hot fat or oil, or to be cooked in hot fat or oil
